p: The use of metals for therapeutic purposes has following advantages: the possibility of preparing stable complexes with predictable structures, the selective choice of ligands according to their affinity, and the increasing know-how on the metal complexes behavior in biological environments (Allesio 2011). The antimalarial activities of several metal complexes were already demonstrated, proving their high potential as alternative treatment against resistant Plasmodium species (Biot et al. 2012; Salas et al. 2013; Wani et al. 2015).
